title: GAMING IDEA
body:
Hey guys I strongly recommend that we add another system in lol were you play about 500 games and get about 1krp or 300 for 5 hextech chests and keys
e.g(500 games=260 rp ) or something like that this will encourage people to play league of legends aka lol
hope this post goes into thought

replies.body:
we already get hextech keys and chests from grinding. I don't think riot will be anymore philanthropic than that and I can't blame them; also 500 games over a season wouldn't be very difficult and 500 games over a week would be close to impossible.

Your idea sounds cool as a user but from a gamemakers perspective it's not viable as unlike the hextech system which encourages you to play new champions and try to master them to achieve S's, this system would kinda just be passively granting players rp and eventually people wouldn't pay it much mind as they'd just passively get rp, a bit like first win of the day to anyone who's already bought most of the champions. Also hextech is already pretty awesome and easy to farm so I don't mind that rp is kinda hard to obtain.
